## ğŸš€ Usage ğŸš€


This will log a guessed zodiac sign to the console, along with a random food ğŸ”, drink ğŸ¹, color ğŸŒˆ, religion ğŸ•Œ, job ğŸ‘·, and hobby ğŸ¨ from the `random-food-selector`, `random-drink-selector`, `random-color-selector`, `random-religion-selector`, `random-job-selector`, and `random-hobby-selector` packages, a guessed smartphone ğŸ“± from the `guess-smartphone` package, and a guessed IQ ğŸ§  from the `guess-iq` package.

## ğŸ”— Dependencies ğŸ”—

This package depends on the `random-food-selector`, `random-drink-selector`, `random-color-selector`, `random-religion-selector`, `random-job-selector`, `random-hobby-selector`, `guess-smartphone`, and `guess-iq` packages.
